meanings.sent1: The apple was unbitten, so it looked fresh and untouched.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich remained unbitten on the plate.
meanings.sent3: The unbitten cookie tempted the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: The unbitten forest seemed to hold secrets within its untouched beauty.
meanings.sent5: The unbitten cake sparkled with frosting, waiting to be enjoyed.

meanings.sent1: The unbitten dog was friendly and approachable.
meanings.sent2: The unbitten child was curious about the new puppy.
meanings.sent3: The unbitten fruit looked inviting to the hungry squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The unbitten path seemed safe and unexplored.
meanings.sent5: The unbitten toy was waiting for a child to play with it.

meanings.definition: Not having been affected by being bitten
meanings.sent1: The unbitten area of skin showed no signs of irritation.
meanings.sent3: The unbitten apple was free from any bruises.
meanings.sent4: The unbitten flower bloomed beautifully without damage.
meanings.sent5: The unbitten fabric felt smooth and untouched.
